body_html:
@colesbury I haven't been able to trace this to a particular layer, but it does seem to be caused by the ATen code - I don't get the issue when I revert to commit 28ed514.

(I'm also suspicious that something around the same time may have broken backwards for BatchNorm2d, but I haven't nailed that down fully yet.)

(I hope it wouldn't be out of turn to suggest that ATen might be a good candidate for a separate feature branch?)
